welcome_message_body: Welcome to Villavicencio, Colombia! Get ready to experience the beauty of our vibrant city, known for its stunning natural landscapes, lively music, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Villavicencio has to offer.

restaurants.name: Coco's
restaurants.description: Coco's is a fast food restaurant located in Villavicencio.
restaurants.address: Avenida del Llano No 41A - 19, Villavicencio, Meta

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Vanguardia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Vanguardia Airport handles all cargo shipments and logistics.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
